TopicTitle: launch probe to specific orbit not working?

Articles.Content:
hi,

my problem is:

Contracts of sending a probe to specific orbit with longitude and inclination are not working.

i send the probes, put them in the (more or less) exact orbit the game asks and the contract doenst close.

i've done a contract before (in the same save) where longitude didnt matter and it closed well.

have 2 probes in that situation.

Tried with fresh install and no mods and still same problem.

btw, ascending and descending show same value (~159Ã‚Âº / ~179Ã‚Âº) but one of them is negative.

Is there a known issue or just my problem?

LandingHeight

4Gb

Radeon 7670M
are you orbiting in the right direction?
It does matter whether your probe orbit is prograde or retrograde.
